name: ptws/excerpt
title: PTWS: Excerpt
description: Applies formatting to the text that conveys it is an excerpt from somewhere else.

children: This book is called 'Nine Things To Do With Your Bicycle When You're In A Zero-G Environment.'  Read with caution.
The first thing you should do is procure some kind of breathing apparatus.
I mean, if you want to stay alive for more than a few minutes anyway.  That's your decision, really.
